snippet: Political incumbents in Europe are suffering a backlash from voters weary of recession. In a series of elections, challengers are making ground against those held responsible for the mess.
abstract: Political incumbents in Europe are suffering a backlash from voters weary of recession. In a series of elections, challengers are making ground against those held responsible for the mess.

headline.main: Across Angry Europe, Voting for 'The Other Lot'
